DOC.brief_summary: A study demonstrate non-inferiority DA-3002 compare Genotropin® .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study Assess Efficacy Safety DA-3002
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed Turner 's Syndrome chromosome analysis The chronological age : 2≤AGE≤12 The yearly growth rate le 6cm ; bone age equal le 12 ; height ≤ 10th percentile height agemates Before adolescence , Tuner stage I ( breast ) Normal thyroid function Growth hormone administer 12 month long past Treated estrogen adrenal androgens 12 month long past Malignancy , CNS Trauma , Psychiatric Disorder
